meanings.definition: The condition of being an auxotroph.
meanings.sent1: Auxotrophies can occur when an organism lacks the ability to synthesize certain nutrients.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the auxotrophies of different bacteria to understand their growth requirements.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of auxotrophies, each person needing a specific dish to survive.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship was an auxotrophy, essential for his emotional well-being.
meanings.sent5: In the garden of life, auxotrophies are the flowers that need special care to bloom.

meanings.sent1: We discussed the various auxotrophies present in the lab cultures.
meanings.sent2: The textbook listed different auxotrophies commonly found in microbial populations.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with auxotrophies, each one representing a unique genetic mutation.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was a garden of auxotrophies, each one adding a different color to their bond.
meanings.sent5: The forest of auxotrophies stood tall, each one a testament to the diversity of life forms.
